name: bcrypt_password
description: You can generate encrypted password and check it with password. you can also use [golang bcrypt](https://pkg.go.dev/golang.org/x/crypto/bcrypt) to check them with hashed password from other library like [bcrypt-ruby](https://github.com/bcrypt-ruby/bcrypt-ruby) used by [devise](https://github.com/heartcombo/devise).
